text: "Toys in the Attic" is a 1975 song by Aerosmith and is the first single from their third studio album Toys in the Attic. It is the B-side to the single You See Me Crying. It was covered by R.E.M. as a B-side to the 1986 single Fall on Me. Category:1975 songs Category:Aerosmith songs Category:R.E.M. songs Category:Hard rock songs Category:Heavy metal
title: Toys in the Attic (song)
